info.title: IIDTManagementClient
info.description: Intelligent IT Digital Twin (IIDT) uses our proprietary discovery tool for corporate on-prem infrastructure and provisions its light-weight twin in Azure.

put.description: The operation to create or update a IT Digital Twins.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: iidtName
parameters.description: The name of the it digital twin.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create it digital twin operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available RP operations.

createdTime.description: Time when this IIDT instance was created.

lastUpdatedTime.description: Time when this IIDT instance was last updated.

configuration.description: configuration for the digital twin project.

domainName.description: Domain name of the enterprise environment.

isManaged.description: Customer concent to allow services maintain enterprise credentials.

canAccess.description: Customer concent to allow services maintain enterprise credentials to access enterprise machines.

ITDigitalTwinProperties.description: Describes the properties of a IT Digital Twin.

properties.title: Digital Twin Properties
properties.description: List the properties of IT Digital Twin

value.description: The list of it digital twins.

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of it digital twin.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Resource Provider operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of Resource Provider operations supported by the Resource Provider resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

role.description: Role of a machine, including VM on Azure and local test machine on-prem

Computer.description: Meta data for the test result.

computerList.description: List of computers on Azure and test machines on-prem

adminUserName.description: Admin user name for accessing the enterprise

adminPassword.description: Admin password for accessing the enterprise

Enterprise.description: Enterprise is a testing environment which has several virtual machines on the cloud and several testing machines on-prem.

ITDigitalTwinPatch.description: IT Digital Twins definition for patch operation

url.description: The url for the backend storage account.

sasToken.description: Short lived sas token for users to upload their test files to the backend database.

assetIp.description: Ip address for the virtual machines.

assetRole.description: Role of an asset, including VMs on Azure and local test machine on-prem

assetBuildNumber.description: Build number for the device OS.

adminUserName.description: Admin user name for accessing the device.

adminPassword.description: Admin password for accessing the device.

domainUserName.description: Domain user name for accessing the enterprise domain.

domainPassword.description: Domain password for accessing the enterprise domain.

AssetProperties.description: Describes the properties of an digitalTwins/assets.

properties.title: Asset properties
properties.description: List the properties of IT Digital Twin Asset

Asset.description: Asset including virtual machines and the on-prem test devices.

properties.title: Asset properties
properties.description: Properties of the child resource asset

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of asset.

TestProperties.description: Describes the properties of an digitalTwins/tests.

properties.title: Test properties

Test.description: Test definition of child resource tests.

properties.title: Test properties
properties.description: Properties of the child resource tests

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of tests.

filePath.description: The path for the generated exe file.

TestPlanProperties.description: Describes the properties of an digitalTwins/testPlans.

properties.title: TestPlan properties
properties.description: List the properties of IT Digital Twin testPlans

TestPlan.description: TestPlan definition of child resource testPlans.

properties.title: TestPlan properties
properties.description: Properties of the child resource testPlans

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of testPlans.

deviceNames.description: List of devices on the execution plan

executionStatus.description: The status on the execution plan

logAvailable.description: Whether the log has been generated or not.

ExecutionPlanProperties.description: Describes the properties of an digitalTwins/executionPlans.

properties.title: ExecutionPlan properties

ExecutionPlan.description: ExecutionPlan definition of child resource executionPlans.

properties.description: Properties of the child resource executionPlans

runExecutionResponseStatus.description: The status on the execution plan

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of executionPlans.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
